<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">if to the Trustee:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Wells Fargo Bank, National Association<br>
Sixth Street and Marquette Avenue<br>
MAC N9303-120<br>
Minneapolis, Minnesota&#160; 55479<br>
Attention: Corporate Trust Services -</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.6in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Huntsman Administrator</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company, the Guarantors and the Trustee by written notice to each
other may designate additional or different addresses for notices.&#160; Any notice or communication to the Company,
the Guarantors or the Trustee shall be deemed to have been given or made as of
the date so delivered if personally delivered; when answered back, if telexed;
when receipt is acknowledged, if faxed; and five (5) calendar days after
mailing if sent by registered or certified mail, postage prepaid (except that a
notice of change of address shall not be deemed to have been given until
actually received by the addressee).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As long as the Securities are listed on the Luxembourg Stock Exchange
and notice is required by the rules of the Luxembourg Stock Exchange, such
notice shall be sufficiently given by publication of such notice to Holders of
the Securities in English in a leading newspaper having general circulation in
Luxembourg (which is expected to be the Luxembourg Wort) or, if such publication
is not practicable, in one other leading English language daily newspaper with
general circulation in Europe, such newspaper being published on each business
day in morning editions, whether or not it shall be published in Saturday,
Sunday or holiday editions.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Any notice or communication mailed to a Holder shall be mailed to him
by first class mail or other equivalent means at his address as it appears on
the registration books of the Registrar and shall be sufficiently given to him
if so mailed within the time prescribed.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Failure to mail a notice or communication to a Noteholder or any defect
in it shall not affect its sufficiency with respect to other Holders.&#160; If a notice or communication is mailed in the
manner provided above, it is duly given, whether or not the addressee receives
it.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><a name="Section13_03"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.03</font></font></a><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="1" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><u>Communications
by Holders with Other Holders</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Holders may communicate pursuant to TIA (&#167;) 312(b) with other Holders
with respect to their rights under this Indenture or the Notes.&#160; The Company, the Trustee, the Registrar and
any other Person shall have the protection of TIA (&#167;) 312(c).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><a name="Section13_04"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.04</font></font></a><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="1" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><u>Certificate
and Opinion as to Conditions Precedent</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Upon any request or application by the Company or the Guarantors to the
Trustee to take any action under this Indenture, the Company shall furnish to
the Trustee:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">111</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='111',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-15048-1\task260913\15048-1-ke-09.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Dec 22 13:11 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>an
Officers&#146; Certificate, in form and substance satisfactory to the Trustee,
stating that, in the opinion of the signers, all conditions precedent to be
performed by the Company, if any, provided for in this Indenture relating to
the proposed action have been complied with; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>an
Opinion of Counsel stating that, in the opinion of such counsel, all such
conditions precedent to be performed by the Company, if any, provided for in
this Indenture relating to the proposed action have been complied with.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><a name="Section13_05"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.05</font></font></a><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="1" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><u>Statements
Required in Certificate or Opinion</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Each certificate or opinion with respect to compliance with a condition
or covenant provided for in this Indenture, other than the Officers&#146;
Certificate required by Section&nbsp;4.07, shall include:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a
statement that the Person making such certificate or opinion has read such
covenant or condition;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a
brief statement as to the nature and scope of the examination or investigation
upon which the statements or opinions contained in such certificate or opinion
are based;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a
statement that, in the opinion of such Person, he has made such examination or
investigation as is reasonably necessary to enable him to express an informed
opinion as to whether or not such covenant or condition has been complied with;
and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(4)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a
statement as to whether or not, in the opinion of each such Person, such
condition or covenant has been complied with.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><a name="Section13_06"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.06</font></font></a><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="1" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><u>Rules
by Trustee, Paying Agent, Registrar</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Trustee may make reasonable rules in accordance with the Trustee&#146;s
customary practices for action by or at a meeting of Holders.&#160; The Paying Agent or Registrar may make
reasonable rules for its functions.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><a name="Section13_07"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.07</font></font></a><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="1" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><u>Legal
Holidays</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If a payment date under this Indenture is not a Business Day, payment
may be made at such place on the next succeeding day that is a Business Day,
and no interest shall accrue for the intervening period.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><a name="Section13_08"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.08</font></font></a><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="1" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><u>Governing
Law</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS INDENTURE, THE NOTES AND THE GUARANTEES SHALL BE GOVERNED BY, AND
CONSTRUED IN ACCORDANCE WITH, THE LAWS OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK.&#160; Each of the parties hereto agrees to submit
to the non-</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">112</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='112',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-15048-1\task260913\15048-1-ke-09.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Dec 22 13:11 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts of the State of New York
in any action or proceeding arising out of or relating to this Indenture or the
Notes.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><a name="Section13_09"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.09</font></font></a><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="1" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><u>No
Adverse Interpretation of Other Agreements</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Indenture may not be used to interpret another indenture, loan or
debt agreement of the Company or any of its Subsidiaries.&#160; Any such indenture, loan or debt agreement
may not be used to interpret this Indenture.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><a name="Section13_10"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.10</font></font></a><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="1" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><u>No
Recourse Against Others</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A past, present or future director, officer, member, manager, employee,
stockholder or incorporator, as such, of the Company or any Guarantor shall not
have any liability for any obligations of the Company or any Guarantor under
the Notes, the Guarantees or this Indenture or for any claim based on, in
respect of or by reason of such obligations or their creations.&#160; Each Holder by accepting a Note waives and
releases all such liability.&#160; Such waiver
and release are part of the consideration for the issuance of the Notes.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><a name="Section13_11"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.11</font></font></a><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="1" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><u>Successors</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">All agreements of the Company in this Indenture and the Notes shall
bind its successors.&#160; All agreements of
the Trustee in this Indenture shall bind its successors.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><a name="Section13_12"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.12</font></font></a><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="1" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><u>Duplicate
Originals</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">All parties may sign any number of copies of this Indenture.&#160; Each signed copy shall be an original, but
all of them together shall represent the same agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><a name="Section13_13"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.13</font></font></a><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="1" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><u>Severability</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In case any one or more of the provisions in this Indenture or in the
Notes shall be held invalid, illegal or unenforceable, in any respect for any
reason, the validity, legality and enforceability of any such provision in
every other respect and of the remaining provisions shall not in any way be
affected or impaired thereby, it being intended that all of the provisions
hereof shall be enforceable to the full extent permitted by law.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><a name="Section13_14"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.14</font></font></a><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;position:relative;text-decoration:none;text-shadow:none;top:0pt;"><font size="1" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><u>Independence
of Covenants</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">All covenants and agreements in this Indenture and the Notes shall be
given independent effect so that if any particular action or condition is not
permitted by any of such covenants, the fact that it would be permitted by an
exception to, or otherwise be within the limitations of, another covenant shall
not avoid the occurrence of a Default or an Event of Default if such action is
taken or condition exists.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[Remainder of Page Intentionally Left Blank]</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">113</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Indenture to be
duly executed, all as of the date first written above.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-15048-1\task260913\15048-1-ke-09.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Dec 22 13:11 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><a name="ExhibitA1"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EXHIBIT A-1</font></a></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[FORM OF RESTRICTED DOLLAR NOTE]</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS SECURITY (OR ITS PREDECESSOR) WAS ORIGINALLY
ISSUED IN A TRANSACTION EXEMPT FROM REGISTRATION UNDER THE UNITED STATES
SECURITIES ACT OF 1933, AS AMENDED (THE &#147;SECURITIES ACT&#148;), AND THIS SECURITY
MAY NOT BE OFFERED, SOLD OR OTHERWISE TRANSFERRED IN THE ABSENCE OF SUCH
REGISTRATION OR AN APPLICABLE EXEMPTION THEREFROM. EACH PURCHASER OF THIS
SECURITY IS NOTIFIED THAT THE SELLER OF THIS SECURITY MAY BE RELYING ON THE
EXEMPTION FROM THE PROVISIONS OF SECTION&nbsp;5 OF THE SECURITIES ACT PROVIDED
BY RULE 144A THEREUNDER.&#160; BY ITS
ACQUISITION HEREOF, THE HOLDER OF THIS SECURITY (1) REPRESENTS THAT (A) IT IS A
&#147;QUALIFIED INSTITUTIONAL BUYER&#148; (AS DEFINED IN RULE 144A UNDER THE SECURITIES
ACT) OR (B) IT IS NOT A U.S. PERSON AND IS ACQUIRING THIS SECURITY IN AN
OFFSHORE TRANSACTION IN COMPLIANCE WITH RULE 904 UNDER THE SECURITIES ACT.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THE HOLDER OF THIS SECURITY AGREES FOR THE BENEFIT
OF HUNTSMAN INTERNATIONAL LLC THAT (A) THIS SECURITY MAY BE OFFERED, RESOLD,
PLEDGED OR OTHERWISE TRANSFERRED, ONLY (I) TO HUNTSMAN INTERNATIONAL LLC OR ITS
SUBSIDIARIES, (II) INSIDE THE UNITED STATES TO A PERSON WHO THE SELLER
REASONABLY BELIEVES IS A QUALIFIED INSTITUTIONAL BUYER (AS DEFINED IN RULE 144A
UNDER THE SECURITIES ACT) IN A TRANSACTION MEETING THE REQUIREMENTS OF RULE
144A, (III) OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES IN AN OFFSHORE TRANSACTION IN ACCORDANCE
WITH RULE 904 UNDER THE SECURITIES ACT, (IV) PURSUANT TO AN EXEMPTION FROM
REGISTRATION UNDER THE SECURITIES ACT PROVIDED BY RULE 144 THEREUNDER (IF
AVAILABLE) OR (V) PURSUANT TO AN EFFECTIVE REGISTRATION STATEMENT UNDER THE
SECURITIES ACT, IN EACH OF CASES (I) THROUGH (V) IN ACCORDANCE WITH ANY
APPLICABLE SECURITIES LAWS OF ANY STATE OF THE UNITED STATES, AND (B) THE
HOLDER WILL, AND EACH SUBSEQUENT HOLDER IS REQUIRED TO, NOTIFY ANY PURCHASER OF
THIS SECURITY FROM IT OF THE RESALE RESTRICTIONS REFERRED TO IN (A) ABOVE.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-1-1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">HUNTSMAN INTERNATIONAL LLC</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7 <sup>3</sup>/<sub>8</sub>% Senior Subordinated Note due 2015</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">No.&#160; $&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;CUSIP
No.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">HUNTSMAN INTERNATIONAL LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (the &#147;Company&#148;),
for value received, promises to pay to
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
or registered assigns, the principal sum of $&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
on January&nbsp;1, 2015.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Interest Payment Dates: January&nbsp;1 and July&nbsp;1</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Record Dates: December&nbsp;15 and June&nbsp;15</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Reference is made to the further provisions of this Note contained
herein, which will for all purposes have the same effect as if set forth at
this place.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-1-2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(REVERSE OF DOLLAR NOTE)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7 <sup>3</sup>/<sub>8</sub>% Senior Subordinated Note due 2015</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160; <u>Interest</u>.&#160; HUNTSMAN INTERNATIONAL LLC, a Delaware
limited liability company (the &#147;Company&#148;), promises to pay interest on the
principal amount of this Dollar Note at the rate per annum shown above.&#160; Interest on the Dollar Notes will accrue from
the most recent date on which interest has been paid or, if no interest has been
paid, from December&nbsp;17, 2004.&#160; The
Company will pay interest semi-annually in arrears on each January&nbsp;1 and July&nbsp;1
(each, an &#147;Interest Payment Date&#148;) and at stated maturity, commencing on July&nbsp;1,
2005.&#160; Interest will be computed on the
basis of a 360-day year comprised of twelve 30-day months.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company shall pay interest on overdue principal and on overdue
installments of interest from time to time on demand at the rate borne by the
Dollar Notes (without regard to any applicable grace periods) to the extent
lawful.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160; <u>Method of Payment</u>.&#160; The Company shall pay interest on the Dollar
Notes (except defaulted interest) to the Persons who are the registered Holders
at the close of business on the Record Date immediately preceding the Interest
Payment Date even if the Dollar Notes are cancelled on registration of transfer
or registration of exchange after such Record Date.&#160; Holders must surrender Dollar Notes to a
Paying Agent to collect principal payments.&#160;
The Company shall pay principal, premium and interest in money of the
United States that at the time of payment is legal tender for payment of public
and private debts (&#147;U.S. Legal Tender&#148;).&#160;
However, the Company may pay principal, premium and interest by its
check payable in such U.S. Legal Tender.&#160;
The Company may deliver any such interest payment to the Paying Agent or
to a Holder at the Holder&#146;s registered address.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160; <u>Paying Agent and Registrar</u>.&#160; Initially, Wells Fargo Bank, National
Association (the &#147;Trustee&#148;) will act as Paying Agent and Registrar.&#160; The Company may change any Paying Agent,
Registrar or co-Registrar without notice to the Holders.&#160; The Company or any of its Subsidiaries may,
subject to certain exceptions, act as Registrar or co-Registrar.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160; <u>Indenture</u>.&#160; The Company issued the Dollar Notes under an
Indenture, dated as of December&nbsp;17, 2004 (the &#147;Indenture&#148;), among the
Company, each of the Guarantors named therein and the Trustee.&#160; This Dollar Note is one of a duly authorized
issue of Dollar Notes of the Company designated as its dollar denominated 7 <sup>3</sup>/<sub>8</sub>%
Senior Subordinated Notes due 2015 (the &#147;Dollar Notes&#148;), which may be issued
under the Indenture.&#160; The Company shall
be entitled to issue Additional Notes pursuant to Section&nbsp;2.18 of the
Indenture.&#160; The Dollar Notes and the
Company&#146;s euro denominated 7 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub>% Senior Subordinated
Notes due 2015 (the &#147;Euro Notes&#148; and, together with the Dollar Notes, the &#147;Notes&#148;)
and any Additional Notes and any Exchange Notes issued in accordance with the
Indenture are treated as a single class of securities under the Indenture
unless otherwise specified in the Indenture.&#160;
Capitalized terms used herein shall have the meanings assigned to them
in the Indenture unless otherwise defined herein.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-1-4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='A-1-4',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-15048-1\task260913\15048-1-ke-09.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Dec 22 13:11 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The terms of the Notes include those stated in the Indenture and those
made part of the Indenture by reference to the Trust Indenture Act of 1939 (15
U.S.C.&#160; &#167;&#167;&nbsp;77aaa-77bbbb) (the &#147;TIA&#148;),
as in effect on the date of the Indenture.&#160;
Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, the Notes are subject
to all such terms, and Holders of Notes are referred to the Indenture and the
TIA for a statement of them.&#160; The Notes
are senior subordinated unsecured obligations of the Company.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160; Optional Redemption.&#160; (a) The Dollar Notes will be redeemable, at
the- Company&#146;s option, in whole at any time or in part from time to time, on
and after January&nbsp;1, 2010, upon not less than 30 nor more than 60 days&#146;
notice, at the following redemption prices (expressed as percentages of the
principal amount thereof) if redeemed during the twelve-month period commencing
on January&nbsp;1 of the year set forth below, plus, in each case, accrued and
unpaid interest thereon, if any, to the date of redemption:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align="center">

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="50%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:50.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="56%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:56.94%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Year</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.72%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="34%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:34.46%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Percentage</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.88%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="56%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:56.94%;">

  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.72%;">

  </td>
  <td width="34%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:34.46%;">

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.88%;">

</div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160; At any time, or from time to
time, prior to January&nbsp;1, 2008, the Company may, at its option, use the
net cash proceeds of one or more Equity Offerings (as defined below) to redeem up
to 40% of the aggregate principal amount of Dollar Notes originally issued
(including the original principal amount of any Additional Dollar Notes) at a
redemption price equal to 107.375% of the principal amount thereof plus accrued
and unpaid interest thereon, if any, to the date of redemption; <u>provided</u>,
<u>however</u>, that at least 60% of the aggregate principal amount of the
Notes originally issued remain (including the principal amount of any
Additional Notes) outstanding immediately after any such redemption.&#160; In order to effect the foregoing redemption
with the proceeds of any Equity Offering, the Company shall make such
redemption not more than 120 days after the consummation of any such Equity
Offering.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160; At any time prior to January&nbsp;1,
2010, the Dollar Notes may be redeemed, in whole or in part at the option of
the Company, upon not less than 30 nor more than 60 days&#146; notice, at a
redemption price (the &#147;Make-Whole Price&#148;) equal to the greater of (i) 100.000%
of the principal amount thereof or (ii) as determined by an Independent
Investment Banker, the present value of (A) 103.688% of the Dollar Notes being
redeemed as of January&nbsp;1, 2010 plus (B) all required interest payments due
on such Dollar Notes through January&nbsp;1, 2010 (excluding accrued interest),
discounted to the Redemption Date on a semiannual basis (assuming a 360-day
year consisting of twelve 30-day months) at the Adjusted Treasury Rate plus, in
each case, accrued interest to the Redemption Date.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.&#160; <u>Notice of Redemption</u>.&#160; Notice of redemption will be mailed at least
30 days but not more than 60 days before the Redemption Date to each Holder
whose Dollar</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-1-5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='A-1-5',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-15048-1\task260913\15048-1-ke-09.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Dec 22 13:11 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notes are to be redeemed at such Holder&#146;s registered address, except as
provided in the Indenture.&#160; Dollar Notes
in denominations larger than $1,000 may be redeemed in part.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.&#160; <u>Change of Control Offer</u>.&#160; In the event of a Change of Control, upon the
satisfaction of the conditions set forth in the Indenture, the Company shall be
required to offer to repurchase all of the then outstanding Notes pursuant to a
Change of Control Offer at a purchase price equal to 101% of the principal
amount thereof plus accrued and unpaid interest, if any, to the date of
purchase.&#160; Holders of Notes that are the
subject of such an offer to repurchase shall receive an offer to repurchase and
may elect to have such Notes repurchased in accordance with the provisions of
the Indenture pursuant to and in accordance with the terms of the Indenture.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.&#160; <u>Limitation on Asset Sales</u>.&#160; Under certain circumstances set forth in Section&nbsp;4.15
of the Indenture, the Company is required to apply the net proceeds from Asset
Sales to offer to repurchase the Notes at a price equal to 100% of the
principal amount thereof plus accrued and unpaid interest thereon, if any, to
the date of repurchase.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.&#160; <u>Denominations; Transfer;
Exchange</u>.&#160; The Dollar Notes are in
fully registered form only, without coupons, in denominations of $1,000 and
integral multiples of $1,000.&#160; A Holder
shall register the transfer or exchange of Notes in accordance with the
Indenture.&#160; The Registrar may require a
Holder, among other things, to furnish appropriate endorsements and transfer
documents and to pay certain transfer taxes or similar governmental charges
payable in connection therewith as permitted by the Indenture.&#160; The Registrar need not register the transfer
or exchange of any Notes during a period beginning 15 days before the mailing
of a redemption notice for any Notes or portions thereof selected for
redemption.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.&#160; <u>Persons Deemed Owners</u>.&#160; The registered Holder of a Note shall be
treated as the owner of it for all purposes.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.&#160; <u>Unclaimed Money</u>.&#160; If money for the payment of principal or
interest remains unclaimed for one year, the Trustee and the Paying Agent will
pay the money back to the Company.&#160; After
that, all liability of the Trustee and such Paying Agent with respect to such
money shall cease.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.&#160; <u>Discharge Prior to
Redemption or Maturity</u>.&#160; If the
Company at any time deposits with the Trustee U.S. Legal Tender or non-callable
U.S. Government Obligations sufficient to pay the principal of, premium and
interest on the Dollar Notes to redemption or maturity and complies with the
other provisions of this Indenture relating thereto, the Company will be
discharged from certain provisions of the Indenture and the Dollar Notes
(including certain covenants, but excluding its obligation to pay the principal
of, premium and interest on the Dollar Notes).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13.&#160; <u>Amendment; Supplement;
Waiver</u>.&#160; The Indenture or the Notes
may be amended or supplemented as provided in the Indenture.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14.&#160; <u>Restrictive Covenants</u>.&#160; The Indenture imposes certain limitations on
the ability of the Company and its Subsidiaries to, among other things, incur
additional</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-1-6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Indebtedness, pay dividends or make certain other restricted payments,
enter into transactions with Affiliates, create dividend or other payment
restrictions affecting Restricted Subsidiaries and merge or consolidate with
any other Person, sell, assign, transfer, lease, convey or otherwise dispose of
all or substantially all of its assets or adopt a plan of liquidation.&#160; Such limitations are subject to a number of
important qualifications and exceptions.&#160;
The Company must annually report to the Trustee on compliance with such
limitations.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15.&#160; <u>Successors</u>.&#160; When a successor assumes, in accordance with
this- Indenture, all the obligations of its predecessor under the Notes and the
Indenture, the predecessor will be released from those obligations.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16.&#160; <u>Defaults and Remedies</u>.&#160; If an Event of Default occurs and is
continuing, the Trustee or the Holders of at least 25% in principal amount of
the then outstanding Notes (including any Additional Notes) may declare all the
Notes to be due and payable in the manner, at the time and with the effect
provided in the Indenture.&#160; Holders of
Notes may not enforce the Indenture or the Notes except as provided in the
Indenture.&#160; The Trustee is not obligated
to enforce the Indenture or the Notes unless it has been offered indemnity or
security reasonably satisfactory to it.&#160;
The Indenture permits, subject to certain limitations therein provided,
Holders of a majority in aggregate principal amount of the Notes (including any
Additional Notes) then outstanding to direct the Trustee in its exercise of any
trust or power.&#160; The Trustee may withhold
from Holders of Notes notice of any continuing Default or Event of Default
(except a Default in payment of principal or interest) if it determines in good
faith that withholding notice is in their interest.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.&#160; <u>Trustee Dealings with
Company</u>.&#160; The Trustee under the
Indenture, in its individual or any other capacity, may become the owner or
pledgee of Notes and may otherwise deal with the Company, its Restricted and
Unrestricted Subsidiaries or their respective Affiliates as if it were not the
Trustee.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18.&#160; <u>No Recourse Against
Others</u>.&#160; No past, present or future
stockholder, director, officer, employee or incorporator, as such, of the
Company shall have any liability for any obligation of the Company under the
Notes or the Indenture or for any claim based on, in respect of or by reason
of, such obligations or their creation.&#160;
Each Holder of a Note by accepting a Note waives and releases all such
liability.&#160; The waiver and release are
part of the consideration for the issuance of the Notes.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19.&#160; <u>Authentication</u>.&#160; This Note shall not be valid until the
Trustee or authenticating agent manually signs the certificate of
authentication on this Note.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20.&#160; <u>Governing Law</u>.&#160; This Note shall be governed by, and construed
in- accordance with, the laws of the State of New York.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">21.&#160; <u>Abbreviations and Defined
Terms</u>.&#160; Customary abbreviations may
be- used in the name of a Holder of a Note or an assignee, such as: TEN COM (=
tenants in common), TEN ENT (= tenants by the entireties), JT TEN (= joint
tenants with right of </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-1-7</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">survivorship and not as tenants in common), CUST (= Custodian), and
U/G/M/A (= Uniform Gifts to Minors Act).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">22.&#160; <u>CUSIP/ISIN Numbers</u>.&#160; The Company may cause CUSIP and/or ISIN
numbers to be printed on the Notes as a convenience to the Holders of the
Notes.&#160; No representation is made as to
the accuracy of such numbers as printed on the Notes and reliance may be placed
only on the other identification numbers printed hereon.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">23.&#160; <u>Registration Rights</u>.&#160; Pursuant to the Registration Rights
Agreement, the Company and the Guarantors will be obligated upon the occurrence
of certain events and subject to certain conditions to consummate an exchange
offer pursuant to which the Holder of this Dollar Note shall have the right to
exchange this Dollar Note for a 7<sup>3</sup>/<sub>8</sub>% Senior Subordinated
Note due 2015 denominated in dollars, of the Company (an &#147;Unrestricted Dollar
Note&#148;) which have been registered under the Securities Act, in like principal
amount and having terms identical in all material respects as this Dollar
Note.&#160; The Holders shall be entitled to
receive certain additional interest payments in the event such exchange offer
is not consummated and upon certain other conditions, all pursuant to and in
accordance with the terms of the Registration Rights Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">24.&#160; <u>Indenture</u>.&#160; Each Holder, by accepting a Note, agrees to
be bound by all of the terms and provisions of the Indenture, as the same may
be amended from time to time.&#160;
Capitalized terms used herein and not defined herein have the meanings
ascribed thereto in the Indenture</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">25.&#160; <u>Guarantees</u>.&#160; This Note will be entitled to the benefits of
certain senior subordinated Guarantees made for the benefit of the
Holders.&#160; Reference is hereby made to the
Indenture for a statement of the respective rights, limitations of rights,
duties and obligations thereunder of the Guarantors, the Trustee and the
Holders.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company will furnish to any Holder of a Note upon written request
and without charge a copy of the Indenture.&#160;
Requests may be made to: HUNTSMAN INTERNATIONAL LLC, 500 Huntsman Way,
Salt Lake City, Utah 84108, Attention: Office of General Counsel.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-1-8</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[FORM OF

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:86.94%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="0%" style="border:none;font-size:1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;"><p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">and, unless the box below is checked, the undersigned confirms that
  such Note is not being transferred to an &#147;affiliate&#148; of the Company as
  defined in Rule 144 under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (an &#147;Affiliate&#148;):</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="0%" style="border:none;font-size:10.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;"><p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Unless one of
the items is checked, the Trustee will refuse to register any of the Notes
evidenced by this certificate in the name of any person other than the
registered Holder thereof; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that if item (3),
(4), (5) or (7) is checked, the Company or the Trustee may require, prior to
registering any such transfer of the Notes, in their sole discretion, such
written legal opinions, certifications (including an investment letter in the
case of box (3) or (4) and other information as the Trustee or the Company have
reasonably requested to confirm that such transfer is being made pursuant</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-1-10</font></p>

<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to an exemption from, or in a
transaction not subject to, the registration requirements of the Securities Act
of l933, as amended.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If none of the
foregoing items are checked, the Trustee or Registrar shall not be obligated to
register this Note in the name of any person other than the Holder hereof
unless and until the conditions to any such transfer of registration set forth
herein and in Section 2.16 of the Indenture shall have been satisfied.</font></p>

acknowledges that it has received such information regarding the Company as the
undersigned has requested pursuant to Rule 144A or has determined not to
request such information and that it is aware that the transferor is relying
upon the undersigned&#146;s foregoing representations in order to claim the
exemption from registration provided by Rule 144A.</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><a name="ExhibitA2"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EXHIBIT A-2</font></a></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[FORM OF
RESTRICTED EURO NOTE]</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS SECURITY (OR ITS PREDECESSOR) WAS ORIGINALLY
ISSUED IN A TRANSACTION EXEMPT FROM REGISTRATION UNDER THE UNITED STATES
SECURITIES ACT OF 1933, AS AMENDED (THE &#147;SECURITIES ACT&#148;), AND THIS SECURITY
MAY NOT BE OFFERED, SOLD OR OTHERWISE&#160;
TRANSFERRED IN THE ABSENCE OF SUCH REGISTRATION OR AN APPLICABLE
EXEMPTION THEREFROM. EACH PURCHASER OF THIS SECURITY IS NOTIFIED THAT THE
SELLER OF THIS SECURITY MAY BE RELYING ON THE EXEMPTION FROM THE PROVISIONS OF
SECTION 5 OF THE SECURITIES ACT PROVIDED BY RULE 144A THEREUNDER. BY ITS
ACQUISITION HEREOF, THE HOLDER OF THIS SECURITY (1) REPRESENTS THAT (A) IT IS A
&#147;QUALIFIED INSTITUTIONAL BUYER&#148; (AS DEFINED IN RULE 144A UNDER THE SECURITIES
ACT) OR (B) IT IS NOT A U.S. PERSON AND IS ACQUIRING THIS SECURITY IN AN
OFFSHORE TRANSACTION IN COMPLIANCE WITH RULE 904 UNDER THE SECURITIES ACT.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THE HOLDER OF THIS SECURITY AGREES FOR THE BENEFIT
OF HUNTSMAN INTERNATIONAL LLC THAT (A) THIS SECURITY MAY BE OFFERED, RESOLD,
PLEDGED OR OTHERWISE TRANSFERRED, ONLY (I) TO HUNTSMAN INTERNATIONAL LLC OR ITS
SUBSIDIARIES, (II) INSIDE THE UNITED STATES TO A PERSON WHO THE SELLER
REASONABLY BELIEVES IS A QUALIFIED INSTITUTIONAL BUYER (AS DEFINED IN RULE 144A
UNDER THE SECURITIES ACT) IN A TRANSACTION MEETING THE REQUIREMENTS OF RULE
144A, (III) OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES IN AN OFFSHORE TRANSACTION IN ACCORDANCE
WITH RULE 904 UNDER THE SECURITIES ACT, (IV) PURSUANT TO AN EXEMPTION FROM
REGISTRATION UNDER THE SECURITIES ACT PROVIDED BY RULE 144 THEREUNDER (IF
AVAILABLE) OR (V) PURSUANT TO AN EFFECTIVE REGISTRATION STATEMENT UNDER THE
SECURITIES ACT, IN EACH OF CASES (I) THROUGH (V) IN ACCORDANCE WITH ANY
APPLICABLE SECURITIES LAWS OF ANY STATE OF THE UNITED STATES, AND (B) THE
HOLDER WILL, AND EACH SUBSEQUENT HOLDER IS REQUIRED TO, NOTIFY ANY PURCHASER OF
THIS SECURITY FROM IT OF THE RESALE RESTRICTIONS REFERRED TO IN (A) ABOVE.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-2-1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

INTERNATIONAL LLC</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7 &#189;% Senior
Subordinated Note due 2015</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

INTERNATIONAL LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (the &#147;Company&#148;), for

or registered assigns, the principal sum of &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,

Payment Dates:&#160; January 1 and July 1</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

Dates:&#160; December 15 and June 15</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

made to the further provisions of this Note contained herein, which will for
all purposes have the same effect as if set forth at this place.</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(REVERSE OF
EURO NOTE)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7 &#189;%&#160; Senior Subordinated Note due 2015</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160; <u>Interest</u>.&#160; HUNTSMAN INTERNATIONAL LLC, a Delaware
limited liability company (the &#147;Company&#148;), promises to pay interest on the
principal amount of this Euro Note at the rate per annum shown above.&#160; Interest on the Euro Notes will accrue from
the most recent date on which interest has been paid or, if no interest has
been paid, from December 17, 2004.&#160; The
Company will pay interest semi- annually in arrears on each January 1 and July
1 (each, an &#147;Interest Payment Date&#148;) and at stated maturity, commencing on July
1, 2005.&#160; Interest will be computed on
the basis of a 360-day year comprised of twelve 30-day months.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company
shall pay interest on overdue principal and on overdue installments of interest
from time to time on demand at the rate borne by the Euro Notes (without regard
to any applicable grace periods) to the extent lawful.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160; <u>Method of Payment</u>.&#160; The Company shall pay interest on the Euro
Notes (except defaulted interest) to the Persons who are the registered Holders
at the close of business on the Record Date immediately preceding the Interest
Payment Date even if the Euro Notes are cancelled on registration of transfer
or registration of exchange after such Record Date.&#160; Holders must surrender Euro Notes to a Paying
Agent to collect principal payments.&#160; The
Company shall pay principal, premium and interest on the Euro Notes in
euros.&#160; However, the Company may pay
principal, premium and interest by its check payable in euros.&#160; The Company may deliver any such interest
payment to the Euro Paying Agent or to a Holder at the Holder&#146;s registered
address.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160; <u>Paying Agent and Registrar</u>.&#160; Initially, Citibank, N.A. will act as Paying
Agent for the Euro Notes and Citigroup Global Markets Deutschland AG &amp; Co.
KGaA will act as Registrar for the Euro Notes.&#160;
The Company may change any Paying Agent, Registrar or co-Registrar
without notice to the Holders.&#160; The
Company or any of its Subsidiaries may, subject to certain exceptions, act as
Registrar or co-Registrar.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160; <u>Indenture</u>.&#160; The Company issued the Euro Notes under an
Indenture, dated as of December 17, 2004 (the &#147;Indenture&#148;), among the Company,
each of the Guarantors named therein and the Trustee.&#160; This Euro Note is one of a duly authorized
issue of Euro Notes of the Company designated as its euro denominated 7 &#189;%
Senior Subordinated Notes due 2015 (the &#147;Euro Notes&#148;) which may be issued under
the Indenture.&#160; The Company shall be
entitled to issue Additional Notes pursuant to Section 2.18 of the
Indenture.&#160; The Euro Notes and the
Company&#146;s dollar denominated 7 &#8540;%&#160;
Senior Subordinated Notes due 2015 (the &#147;Dollar Notes&#148; and, together
with the Euro Notes, the &#147;Notes&#148;) and any Additional Notes and any Exchange
Notes issued in accordance with the Indenture are treated as a single class of
securities under the Indenture unless otherwise specified in the
Indenture.&#160; Capitalized terms used herein
shall have the meanings assigned to them in the Indenture unless otherwise
defined herein.&#160; The terms of the Notes
include those stated in the Indenture and those made part of the</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-2-4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>
