<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Indenture by reference to the
Trust Indenture Act of 1939 (15 U.S.C.&#160;
&#167;&#167; 77aaa-77bbbb) (the &#147;TIA&#148;), as in effect on the date of the
Indenture.&#160; Notwithstanding anything to
the contrary herein, the Notes are subject to all such terms, and Holders of
Notes are referred to the Indenture and the TIA for a statement of them.&#160; The Notes are senior subordinated unsecured
obligations of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160; <u>Optional Redemption</u>.&#160; (a) The Euro Notes will be redeemable, at
the- Company&#146;s option, in whole at any time or in part from time to time, on
and after January 1, 2010, upon not less than 30 nor more than 60 days&#146; notice,
at the following redemption prices (expressed as percentages of the principal
amount thereof) if redeemed during the twelve-month period commencing on
January 1 of the year set forth below, plus, in each case, accrued and unpaid
interest thereon, if any, to the date of redemption:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align="center">

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="60%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:60.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="52%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:52.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Year</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:6.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="33%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:33.68%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Percentage</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="52%" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:52.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:6.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="33%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:33.68%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="52%" valign="top" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:52.78%;">

  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:6.78%;">

  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">103.750</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>

  <td width="52%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:52.78%;">

  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:6.78%;">

  </td>
  <td width="33%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:33.68%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">102.500</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.0%;">

  </td>

  <td width="52%" valign="top" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:52.78%;">

  </td>

  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:6.78%;">

  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">100.000</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160; At any time, or from time to time, prior to
January 1, 2008, the Company may, at its option, use the net cash proceeds of
one or more Equity Offerings (as defined below) to redeem up to 40% of the
aggregate principal amount of Euro Notes originally issued (including the
original principal amount of any Additional Euro Notes) at a redemption price
equal to 107.500% of the principal amount thereof plus accrued and unpaid
interest thereon, if any, to the date of redemption; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>,
that at least 60% of the aggregate principal amount of the Notes originally
issued remain (including the principal amount of any Additional Notes)
outstanding immediately after any such redemption.&#160; In order to effect the foregoing redemption
with the proceeds of any Equity Offering, the Company shall make such
redemption not more than 120 days after the consummation of any such Equity
Offering.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160; At any time prior to January 1, 2010, the
Euro Notes may be redeemed, in whole or in part, at the option of the Company,
upon not less than 30 nor more than 60 days&#146; notice, at a redemption price (the
&#147;Make-Whole Price&#148;) equal to the greater of (i) 100.000% of the principal
amount thereof or (ii) as determined by an Independent Investment Banker, the
present value of (A) 103.750% of the Euro Notes being redeemed as of January 1,
2010 plus (B) all required interest payments due on such Euro Notes through
January 1, 2010 (excluding accrued interest), discounted to the Redemption Date
on a semiannual basis (assuming a 360-day year consisting of twelve 30-day
months) at the Adjusted Bund Rate plus, in each case, accrued interest to the
Redemption Date.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.&#160; <u>Notice of Redemption</u>.&#160; Notice of redemption will be mailed at least
30 days but not more than 60 days before the Redemption Date to each Holder
whose Euro Notes are to be redeemed at such Holder&#146;s registered address, except
as provided in the Indenture.&#160; Euro Notes
in denominations larger than&#160; &#128;1,000 may
be redeemed in part.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-2-5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='A-2-5',FILE='C:\JMS\rramali\04-15048-1\task258244\15048-1-ke-11.htm',USER='rramalingam',CD='Dec 21 01:35 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.&#160; <u>Change of Control Offer</u>.&#160; In the event of a Change of Control, upon the
satisfaction of the conditions set forth in the Indenture, the Company shall be
required to offer to repurchase all of the then outstanding Notes pursuant to a
Change of Control Offer at a purchase price equal to 101% of the principal
amount thereof plus accrued and unpaid interest, if any, to the date of
purchase.&#160; Holders of Notes that are the
subject of such an offer to repurchase shall receive an offer to repurchase and
may elect to have such Notes repurchased in accordance with the provisions of
the Indenture pursuant to and in accordance with the terms of the Indenture.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.&#160; <u>Limitation on Asset Sales</u>.&#160; Under certain circumstances set forth in
Section 4.15 of the Indenture, the Company is required to apply the net
proceeds from Asset Sales to offer to repurchase the Notes at a price equal to
100% of the principal amount thereof plus accrued and unpaid interest thereon,
if any, to the date of repurchase.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.&#160; <u>Denominations; Transfer; Exchange</u>.&#160; The Euro Notes are in fully registered form
only, without coupons, in denominations of&#160;
&#128;1,000 and integral multiples of&#160;
&#128;1,000.&#160; A Holder shall register
the transfer or exchange of Notes in accordance with the Indenture.&#160; The Registrar may require a Holder, among
other things, to furnish appropriate endorsements and transfer documents and to
pay certain transfer taxes or similar governmental charges payable in connection
therewith as permitted by the Indenture.&#160;
The Registrar need not register the transfer or exchange of any Notes
during a period beginning 15 days before the mailing of a redemption notice for
any Notes or portions thereof selected for redemption.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.&#160; <u>Persons Deemed Owners</u>.&#160; The registered Holder of a Note shall be
treated as the owner of it for all purposes.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.&#160; <u>Unclaimed Money</u>.&#160; If money for the payment of principal or
interest remains unclaimed for one year, the Trustee and the Paying Agent will
pay the money back to the Company.&#160; After
that, all liability of the Trustee and such Paying Agent with respect to such
money shall cease.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.&#160; <u>Discharge Prior to Redemption or
Maturity.&#160; </u>If the Company at any time
deposits with the Trustee euros or non-callable Euro Obligations sufficient to
pay the principal of, premium and interest on the Euro Notes to redemption or
maturity and complies with the other provisions of this Indenture relating
thereto, the Company will be discharged from certain provisions of the
Indenture and the Euro Notes (including certain covenants, but excluding its
obligation to pay the principal of, premium and interest on the Euro Notes).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13.&#160; <u>Amendment; Supplement; Waiver</u>.&#160; The Indenture or the Notes may be amended or
supplemented as provided in the Indenture.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14.&#160; <u>Restrictive Covenants</u>.&#160; The Indenture imposes certain limitations on
the ability of the Company and its Subsidiaries to, among other things, incur
additional Indebtedness, pay dividends or make certain other restricted
payments, enter into transactions with Affiliates, create dividend or other
payment restrictions affecting</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-2-6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='A-2-6',FILE='C:\JMS\rramali\04-15048-1\task258244\15048-1-ke-11.htm',USER='rramalingam',CD='Dec 21 01:35 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Restricted Subsidiaries and
merge or consolidate with any other Person, sell, assign, transfer, lease,
convey or otherwise dispose of all or substantially all of its assets or adopt
a plan of liquidation.&#160; Such limitations
are subject to a number of important qualifications and exceptions.&#160; The Company must annually report to the
Trustee on compliance with such limitations.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15.&#160; <u>Successors</u>.&#160; When a successor assumes, in accordance with
this- Indenture, all the obligations of its predecessor under the Notes and the
Indenture, the predecessor will be released from those obligations.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16.&#160; <u>Defaults and Remedies</u>.&#160; If an Event of Default occurs and is
continuing, the Trustee or the Holders of at least 25% in principal amount of
the then outstanding Notes (including any Additional Notes) may declare all the
Notes to be due and payable in the manner, at the time and with the effect
provided in the Indenture.&#160; Holders of
Notes may not enforce the Indenture or the Notes except as provided in the
Indenture.&#160; The Trustee is not obligated
to enforce the Indenture or the Notes unless it has been offered indemnity or
security reasonably satisfactory to it.&#160;
The Indenture permits, subject to certain limitations therein provided,
Holders of a majority in aggregate principal amount of the Notes (including any
Additional Notes) then outstanding to direct the Trustee in its exercise of any
trust or power.&#160; The Trustee may withhold
from Holders of Notes notice of any continuing Default or Event of Default
(except a Default in payment of principal or interest) if it determines in good
faith that withholding notice is in their interest.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.&#160; <u>Trustee Dealings with Company</u>.&#160; The Trustee under the Indenture, in its
individual or any other capacity, may become the owner or pledgee of Notes and
may otherwise deal with the Company, its Restricted and Unrestricted
Subsidiaries or their respective Affiliates as if it were not the Trustee.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18.&#160; <u>No Recourse Against Others</u>.&#160; No past, present or future stockholder,
director, officer, employee or incorporator, as such, of the Company shall have
any liability for any obligation of the Company under the Notes or the
Indenture or for any claim based on, in respect of or by reason of, such
obligations or their creation.&#160; Each
Holder of a Note by accepting a Note waives and releases all such liability.&#160; The waiver and release are part of the
consideration for the issuance of the Notes.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19.&#160; <u>Authentication</u>.&#160; This Note shall not be valid until the
Trustee or authenticating agent manually signs the certificate of
authentication on this Note.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20.&#160; <u>Governing Law</u>.&#160; This Note shall be governed by, and construed
in- accordance with, the laws of the State of New York.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">21.&#160; <u>Abbreviations and Defined Terms</u>.&#160; Customary abbreviations may be- used in the
name of a Holder of a Note or an assignee, such as: TEN COM (= tenants in
common), TEN ENT (= tenants by the entireties), JT TEN (= joint tenants with
right of survivorship and not as tenants in common), CUST (= Custodian), and
U/G/M/A (= Uniform Gifts to Minors Act).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-2-7</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='A-2-7',FILE='C:\JMS\rramali\04-15048-1\task258244\15048-1-ke-11.htm',USER='rramalingam',CD='Dec 21 01:35 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">22.&#160; <u>CUSIP/ISIN Numbers</u>.&#160; The Company may cause CUSIP and/or ISIN
numbers to be printed on the Notes as a convenience to the Holders of the
Notes.&#160; No representation is made as to
the accuracy of such numbers as printed on the Notes and reliance may be placed
only on the other identification numbers printed hereon.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">23.&#160; <u>Registration Rights</u>.&#160; Pursuant to the Registration Rights
Agreement, the Company and the Guarantors will be obligated upon the occurrence
of certain events and subject to certain conditions to consummate an exchange
offer pursuant to which the Holder of this Euro Note shall have the right to
exchange this Euro Note for a 7&#189;% Senior Subordinated Note due 2015 denominated
in euros of the Company (an &#147;Unrestricted Euro Note&#148;) which have been
registered under the Securities Act, in like principal amount and having terms
identical in all material respects as this Euro Note.&#160; The Holders shall be entitled to receive
certain additional interest payments in the event such exchange offer is not
consummated and upon certain other conditions, all pursuant to and in
accordance with the terms of the Registration Rights Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">24.&#160; <u>Indenture</u>.&#160; Each Holder, by accepting a Note, agrees to
be bound by all of the terms and provisions of the Indenture, as the same may
be amended from time to time.&#160;
Capitalized terms used herein and not defined herein have the meanings
ascribed thereto in the Indenture</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">25.&#160; <u>Guarantees</u>.&#160; This Note will be entitled to the benefits of
certain senior subordinated Guarantees made for the benefit of the Holders.&#160; Reference is hereby made to the Indenture for
a statement of the respective rights, limitations of rights, duties and
obligations thereunder of the Guarantors, the Trustee and the Holders.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company
will furnish to any Holder of a Note upon written request and without charge a
copy of the Indenture.&#160; Requests may be
made to: HUNTSMAN INTERNATIONAL LLC, 500 Huntsman Way, Salt Lake City, Utah
84108, Attention: Office of General Counsel.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-2-8</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In connection
with any transfer of this Note occurring prior to the date of the declaration
by the Commission of the effectiveness of a registration statement under the
Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the &#147;Securities Act&#148;) covering resales of
this Note (which effectiveness shall not have been suspended or terminated at the
date of the transfer) the undersigned confirms that it has not utilized any
general solicitation or general advertising in connection with the transfer and
that the sale is being made:</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="0%" style="border:none;font-size:1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;"><p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
  <td width="99%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:99.88%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">and, unless the box below is checked, the
  undersigned confirms that Note is not being transferred to an &#147;affiliate&#148; of
  the Company as defined in Rule 144 under the Securities Act of 1933, as
  amended (an &#147;Affiliate&#148;):</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="0%" style="border:none;font-size:10.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;"><p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
  <td width="99%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:99.88%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Unless one of
the items is checked, the Trustee will refuse to register any of the Notes
evidenced by this certificate in the name of any person other than the
registered Holder thereof; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that if item (3),
(4), (5) or (7) is checked, the Company or the Trustee may require, prior to
registering any such transfer of the Notes, in their sole discretion, such
written legal opinions, certifications (including an investment letter in the
case of box (3) or (4) and other information as the Trustee or the Company have
reasonably requested to confirm that such transfer is being made pursuant to an
exemption from, or in a transaction not subject to, the registration
requirements of the Securities Act of l933, as amended.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

discretion and that it and any such account is a &#147;qualified institutional
buyer&#148; within the meaning of Rule 144A under the Securities Act of 1933, as
amended, and is aware that the sale to it is being made in reliance on Rule
144A and acknowledges that it has received such information regarding the
Company as the undersigned has requested pursuant to Rule 144A or has
determined not to request such information and that it is aware that the
transferor is relying upon the undersigned&#146;s foregoing representations in order
to claim the exemption from registration provided by Rule 144A.</font></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><a name="ExhibitA3"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EXHIBIT A-3</font></a></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[FORM OF

Senior Subordinated Note due 2015</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">HUNTSMAN
INTERNATIONAL LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (the &#147;Company&#148;), for
value received, promises to pay
to&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
or registered assigns, the principal sum of&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
on January&nbsp;1, 2015.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Interest
Payment Dates:&#160; January&nbsp;1 and July&nbsp;1</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Record
Dates:&#160; December&nbsp;15 and June&nbsp;15</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Reference is
made to the further provisions of this Note contained herein, which will for
all purposes have the same effect as if set forth at this place.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-3-1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

by its duly authorized officer.</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(REVERSE OF
DOLLAR NOTE)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7&#8540;%
Senior Subordinated Note due 2015</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160; <u>Interest</u>.&#160; HUNTSMAN INTERNATIONAL LLC, a Delaware
limited liability company (the &#147;Company&#148;), promises to pay interest on the
principal amount of this Dollar Note at the rate per annum shown above.&#160; Interest on the Dollar Notes will accrue from
the most recent date on which interest has been paid or, if no interest has
been paid, from December&nbsp;17, 2004.&#160;
The Company will pay interest semi-annually in arrears on each January&nbsp;1
and July&nbsp;1 (each, an &#147;Interest Payment Date&#148;) and at stated maturity,
commencing on July&nbsp;1, 2005.&#160;
Interest will be computed on the basis of a 360-day year comprised of
twelve 30-day months.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company
shall pay interest on overdue principal and on overdue installments of interest
from time to time on demand at the rate borne by the Dollar Notes (without
regard to any applicable grace periods) to the extent lawful.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160; <u>Method of Payment</u>.&#160; The Company shall pay interest on the Dollar
Notes (except defaulted interest) to the Persons who are the registered Holders
at the close of business on the Record Date immediately preceding the Interest
Payment Date even if the Dollar Notes are cancelled on registration of transfer
or registration of exchange after such Record Date.&#160; Holders must surrender Dollar Notes to a
Paying Agent to collect principal payments.&#160;
The Company shall pay principal, premium and interest in money of the
United States that at the time of payment is legal tender for payment of public
and private debts (&#147;U.S. Legal Tender&#148;).&#160;
However, the Company may pay principal, premium and interest by its
check payable in such U.S. Legal Tender.&#160;
The Company may deliver any such interest payment to the Paying Agent or
to a Holder at the Holder&#146;s registered address.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160; <u>Paying Agent and Registrar</u>.&#160; Initially, Wells Fargo Bank, National
Association&#160; (the &#147;Trustee&#148;) will act as
Paying Agent and Registrar.&#160; The Company
may change any Paying Agent, Registrar or co-Registrar without notice to the
Holders.&#160; The Company or any of its
Subsidiaries may, subject to certain exceptions, act as Registrar or
co-Registrar.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160; <u>Indenture</u>.&#160; The Company issued the Dollar Notes under an
Indenture, dated as of December&nbsp;17, 2004 (the &#147;Indenture&#148;), among the
Company, each of the Guarantors named therein and the Trustee.&#160; This Dollar Note is one of a duly authorized
issue of Dollar Notes of the Company designated as its dollar denominated
7&#8540;% Senior Subordinated Notes due 2015 (the &#147;Dollar Notes&#148;) which may be
issued under the Indenture.&#160; The Company
shall be entitled to issue Additional Notes pursuant to Section&nbsp;2.18 of
the Indenture.&#160; The Dollar Notes and the
Company&#146;s euro denominated 7&#189;% Senior Subordinated Notes due 2015 (the &#147;Euro
Notes&#148; and, together with the Dollar Notes, the &#147;Notes&#148;) and any Additional
Notes and any Exchange Notes issued in accordance with the Indenture are
treated as a single class of securities under the Indenture unless otherwise
specified in the Indenture.&#160; Capitalized
terms used herein shall</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-3-3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">have the meanings assigned to them in the Indenture unless otherwise
defined herein.&#160; The terms of the Notes
include those stated in the Indenture and those made part of the Indenture by
reference to the Trust Indenture Act of 1939 (15 U.S.C.&#160; &#167;&#167;&nbsp;77aaa-77bbbb) (the &#147;TIA&#148;), as in
effect on the date of the Indenture.&#160;
Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, the Notes are subject
to all such terms, and Holders of Notes are referred to the Indenture and the
TIA for a statement of them.&#160; The Notes
are senior subordinated unsecured obligations of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160; <u>Optional Redemption</u>.&#160; (a) The Dollar Notes will be redeemable, at
the- Company&#146;s option, in whole at any time or in part from time to time, on
and after January&nbsp;1, 2010, upon not less than 30 nor more than 60 days&#146;
notice, at the following redemption prices (expressed as percentages of the
principal amount thereof) if redeemed during the twelve-month period commencing
on January&nbsp;1 of the year set forth below, plus, in each case, accrued and
unpaid interest thereon, if any, to the date of redemption:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="4%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in .7pt 0in;width:4.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="74%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:74.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2013 and
  thereafter</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="20%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:20.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">100.000</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="4%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:4.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160; At any time, or from time to time, prior to January&nbsp;1,
2008, the Company may, at its option, use the net cash proceeds of one or more
Equity Offerings (as defined below) to redeem up to 40% of the aggregate
principal amount of Dollar Notes originally issued (including the original
principal amount of any Additional Dollar Notes) at a redemption price equal to
107.375% of the principal amount thereof plus accrued and unpaid interest
thereon, if any, to the date of redemption; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>,
that at least 60% of the aggregate principal amount of the Notes originally
issued remain (including the principal amount of any Additional
Notes)outstanding immediately after any such redemption.&#160; In order to effect the foregoing redemption
with the proceeds of any Equity Offering, the Company shall make such
redemption not more than 120 days after the consummation of any such Equity
Offering.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160; At any time prior to January&nbsp;1, 2010,
the Dollar Notes may be redeemed, in whole or in part at the option of the
Company, upon not less than 30 nor more than 60 days&#146; notice, at a redemption
price (the &#147;Make-Whole Price&#148;) equal to the greater of (i) 100.000% of the
principal amount thereof or (ii) as determined by an Independent Investment
Banker, the present value of (A) 103.688% of the Dollar Notes being redeemed as
of January&nbsp;1, 2010 plus (B) all required interest payments due on such
Dollar Notes through January&nbsp;1, 2010 (excluding accrued interest),
discounted to the Redemption Date on a semiannual basis (assuming a 360-day
year consisting of twelve 30-day months) at the Adjusted Treasury Rate plus in
each case accrued interest to the Redemption Date.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.&#160; <u>Notice of Redemption</u>.&#160; Notice of redemption will be mailed at least
30 days but not more than 60 days before the Redemption Date to each Holder
whose Dollar</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-3-4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='A-3-4',FILE='C:\JMS\rramali\04-15048-1\task258244\15048-1-ke-11.htm',USER='rramalingam',CD='Dec 21 01:35 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notes are to be redeemed at such Holder&#146;s registered address, except as
provided in the Indenture.&#160; Dollar Notes
in denominations larger than $1,000 may be redeemed in part.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.&#160; <u>Change of Control Offer</u>.&#160; In the event of a Change of Control, upon the
satisfaction of the conditions set forth in the Indenture, the Company shall be
required to offer to repurchase all of the then outstanding Notes pursuant to a
Change of Control Offer at a purchase price equal to 101% of the principal
amount thereof plus accrued and unpaid interest, if any, to the date of
purchase.&#160; Holders of Notes that are the
subject of such an offer to repurchase shall receive an offer to repurchase and
may elect to have such Notes repurchased in accordance with the provisions of
the Indenture pursuant to and in accordance with the terms of the Indenture.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.&#160; <u>Limitation on Asset Sales</u>.&#160; Under certain circumstances set forth in Section&nbsp;4.15
of the Indenture, the Company is required to apply the net proceeds from Asset
Sales to offer to repurchase the Notes at a price equal to 100% of the
principal amount thereof plus accrued and unpaid interest thereon, if any, to
the date of repurchase.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.&#160; <u>Denominations; Transfer; Exchange</u>.&#160; The Dollar Notes are in fully registered form
only, without coupons, in denominations of $1,000 and integral multiples of
$1,000.&#160; A Holder shall register the
transfer or exchange of Notes in accordance with the Indenture.&#160; The Registrar may require a Holder, among
other things, to furnish appropriate endorsements and transfer documents and to
pay certain transfer taxes or similar governmental charges payable in
connection therewith as permitted by the Indenture.&#160; The Registrar need not register the transfer
or exchange of any Notes during a period beginning 15 days before the mailing
of a redemption notice for any Notes or portions thereof selected for
redemption.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.&#160; <u>Persons Deemed Owners</u>.&#160; The registered Holder of a Note shall be treated
as the owner of it for all purposes.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.&#160; <u>Unclaimed Money</u>.&#160; If money for the payment of principal or
interest remains unclaimed for one year, the Trustee and the Paying Agent will
pay the money back to the Company.&#160; After
that, all liability of the Trustee and such Paying Agent with respect to such
money shall cease.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.&#160; <u>Discharge Prior to Redemption or Maturity</u>.&#160; If the Company at any time deposits with the
Trustee U.S. Legal Tender or non-callable U.S. Government Obligations
sufficient to pay the principal of, premium and interest on the Dollar Notes to
redemption or maturity and complies with the other provisions of this Indenture
relating thereto, the Company will be discharged from certain provisions of the
Indenture and the Dollar Notes (including certain covenants, but excluding its
obligation to pay the principal of, premium and interest on the Dollar Notes).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13.&#160; <u>Amendment; Supplement; Waiver</u>.&#160; The Indenture or the Notes may be amended or
supplemented as provided in the Indenture.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14.&#160; <u>Restrictive Covenants</u>.&#160; The Indenture imposes certain limitations on
the ability of the Company and its Subsidiaries to, among other things, incur
additional</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-3-5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\JMS\rramali\04-15048-1\task258244\15048-1-ke-11.htm',USER='rramalingam',CD='Dec 21 01:35 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Indebtedness, pay dividends or make certain other restricted payments,
enter into transactions with Affiliates, create dividend or other payment
restrictions affecting Restricted Subsidiaries and merge or consolidate with
any other Person, sell, assign, transfer, lease, convey or otherwise dispose of
all or substantially all of its assets or adopt a plan of liquidation.&#160; Such limitations are subject to a number of
important qualifications and exceptions.&#160;
The Company must annually report to the Trustee on compliance with such
limitations.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15.&#160; <u>Successors</u>.&#160; When a successor assumes, in accordance with
this- Indenture, all the obligations of its predecessor under the Notes and the
Indenture, the predecessor will be released from those obligations.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16.&#160; <u>Defaults and Remedies</u>.&#160; If an Event of Default occurs and is
continuing, the Trustee or the Holders of at least 25% in principal amount of
the then outstanding Notes (including any Additional Notes) may declare all the
Notes to be due and payable in the manner, at the time and with the effect
provided in the Indenture.&#160; Holders of
Notes may not enforce the Indenture or the Notes except as provided in the
Indenture.&#160; The Trustee is not obligated
to enforce the Indenture or the Notes unless it has been offered indemnity or
security reasonably satisfactory to it.&#160;
The Indenture permits, subject to certain limitations therein provided,
Holders of a majority in aggregate principal amount of the Notes (including any
Additional Notes) then outstanding to direct the Trustee in its exercise of any
trust or power.&#160; The Trustee may withhold
from Holders of Notes notice of any continuing Default or Event of Default
(except a Default in payment of principal or interest) if it determines in good
faith that withholding notice is in their interest.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.&#160; <u>Trustee Dealings with Company</u>.&#160; The Trustee under the Indenture, in its
individual or any other capacity, may become the owner or pledgee of Notes and
may otherwise deal with the Company, its Restricted and Unrestricted
Subsidiaries or their respective Affiliates as if it were not the Trustee.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18.&#160; <u>No Recourse Against Others</u>.&#160; No past, present or future stockholder,
director, officer, employee or incorporator, as such, of the Company shall have
any liability for any obligation of the Company under the Notes or the
Indenture or for any claim based on, in respect of or by reason of, such
obligations or their creation.&#160; Each
Holder of a Note by accepting a Note waives and releases all such
liability.&#160; The waiver and release are
part of the consideration for the issuance of the Notes.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19.&#160; <u>Authentication</u>.&#160; This Note shall not be valid until the
Trustee or authenticating agent manually signs the certificate of
authentication on this Note.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20.&#160; <u>Governing Law</u>.&#160; This Note shall be governed by, and construed
in- accordance with, the laws of the State of New York.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">21.&#160; <u>Abbreviations and Defined Terms</u>.&#160; Customary abbreviations may be- used in the
name of a Holder of a Note or an assignee, such as: TEN COM (= tenants in
common), TEN ENT (= tenants by the entireties), JT TEN (= joint tenants with
right of</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-3-6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">survivorship and not as tenants in common), CUST (= Custodian), and
U/G/M/A (= Uniform Gifts to Minors Act).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">22.&#160; <u>CUSIP/ISIN Numbers</u>.&#160; The Company may cause CUSIP and/or ISIN
numbers to be printed on the Notes as a convenience to the Holders of the
Notes.&#160; No representation is made as to
the accuracy of such numbers as printed on the Notes and reliance may be placed
only on the other identification numbers printed hereon.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">23.&#160; <u>Indenture</u>.&#160; Each Holder, by accepting a Note, agrees to
be bound by all of the terms and provisions of the Indenture, as the same may
be amended from time to time.&#160;
Capitalized terms used herein and not defined herein have the meanings
ascribed thereto in the Indenture.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">24.&#160; <u>Guarantees</u>.&#160; This Note will be entitled to the benefits of
certain senior subordinated Guarantees made for the benefit of the
Holders.&#160; Reference is hereby made to the
Indenture for a statement of the respective rights, limitations of rights,
duties and obligations thereunder of the Guarantors, the Trustee and the
Holders.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company
will furnish to any Holder of a Note upon written request and without charge a
copy of the Indenture.&#160; Requests may be
made to: HUNTSMAN INTERNATIONAL LLC, 500 Huntsman Way, Salt Lake City, Utah
84108, Attention: Office of General Counsel.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-3-7</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

</font></div>

  </td>
 </tr>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">attorney to transfer the Note on the books of
the Company with full power of substitution in the premises.</font></p>

elect to have this Note purchased by the Company pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.14
or Section&nbsp;4.15 of the Indenture, check the appropriate box:</font></p>

or Section&nbsp;4.15 of the Indenture, state the amount:&#160;

<div>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><a name="ExhibitA4"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EXHIBIT A-4</font></u></a></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[FORM OF
UNRESTRICTED EURO NOTE]</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">HUNTSMAN
INTERNATIONAL LLC</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7<sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub>%
Senior Subordinated Note due 2015</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="673" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:505.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">No.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="47" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:35.0pt;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EU[&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;]</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ISIN</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">HUNTSMAN
INTERNATIONAL LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (the &#147;Company&#148;), for
value received, promises to pay to &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
or registered assigns, the principal sum of &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
on January&nbsp;1, 2015.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Interest
Payment Dates:&#160; January&nbsp;1 and July&nbsp;1</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Record
Dates:&#160; December&nbsp;15 and June&nbsp;15</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Reference is
made to the further provisions of this Note contained herein, which will for
all purposes have the same effect as if set forth at this place.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="42%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:42.94%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="57%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:57.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.92%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">By:</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="39%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:39.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="57%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:57.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.92%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="39%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:39.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Authorized Signature</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-4-2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='A-4-2',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-15048-1\task258436\15048-1-ke-13.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Dec 20 15:06 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(REVERSE OF
EURO NOTE)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7<sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub>%
Senior Subordinated Note due 2015</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160; <u>Interest</u>.&#160; HUNTSMAN INTERNATIONAL LLC, a Delaware
limited liability company (the &#147;Company&#148;), promises to pay interest on the
principal amount of this Euro Note at the rate per annum shown above.&#160; Interest on the Euro Notes will accrue from
the most recent date on which interest has been paid or, if no interest has
been paid, from December&nbsp;17, 2004.&#160;
The Company will pay interest semi- annually in arrears on each January&nbsp;1
and July&nbsp;1 (each, an &#147;Interest Payment Date&#148;) and at stated maturity,
commencing on July&nbsp;1, 2005.&#160;
Interest will be computed on the basis of a 360-day year comprised of
twelve 30-day months.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company
shall pay interest on overdue principal and on overdue installments of interest
from time to time on demand at the rate borne by the Euro Notes (without regard
to any applicable grace periods) to the extent lawful.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160; <u>Method of Payment</u>.&#160; The Company shall pay interest on the Euro
Notes (except defaulted interest) to the Persons who are the registered Holders
at the close of business on the Record Date immediately preceding the Interest
Payment Date even if the Euro Notes are cancelled on registration of transfer
or registration of exchange after such Record Date.&#160; Holders must surrender Euro Notes to a Paying
Agent to collect principal payments.&#160; The
Company shall pay principal, premium and interest on the Euro Notes in
euros.&#160; However, the Company may pay
principal, premium and interest by its check payable in euros.&#160; The Company may deliver any such interest
payment to the Euro Paying Agent or to a Holder at the Holder&#146;s registered
address.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160; <u>Paying Agent and Registrar</u>.&#160; Initially Citibank, N.A. will act as Paying
Agent for the Euro Notes and Citigroup Global Markets Deutschland AG &amp; Co
KGaA will act as Registrar for the Euro Notes.&#160;
The Company may change any Paying Agent, Registrar or co-Registrar
without notice to the Holders.&#160; The
Company or any of its Subsidiaries may, subject to certain exceptions, act as
Registrar or co-Registrar.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160; <u>Indenture</u>.&#160; The Company issued the Euro Notes under an
Indenture, dated as of December&nbsp;17, 2004 (the &#147;Indenture&#148;), among the
Company, each of the Guarantors named therein and the Trustee.&#160; This Euro Note is one of a duly authorized
issue of Euro Notes of the Company designated as its euro denominated 7<sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub>%
Senior Subordinated Notes due 2015 (the &#147;Euro Notes&#148;) which may be issued under
the Indenture.&#160; The Company shall be
entitled to issue Additional Notes pursuant to Section&nbsp;2.18 of the
Indenture.&#160; The Euro Notes and the
Company&#146;s dollar denominated 7<sup>3</sup>/<sub>8</sub>% Senior Subordinated
Notes due 2015 (the &#147;Dollar Notes&#148; and, together with the Euro Notes, the &#147;Notes&#148;)
and any Additional Notes and any Exchange Notes issued in accordance with the
Indenture are treated as a single class of securities under the Indenture
unless otherwise specified in the Indenture.&#160;
Capitalized terms used herein shall have the meanings assigned to them
in the Indenture unless otherwise defined herein.&#160; The terms of the Notes include those stated
in the Indenture and those made part of the</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-4-3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='A-4-3',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-15048-1\task258436\15048-1-ke-13.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Dec 20 15:06 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Indenture by reference to the Trust Indenture Act of 1939 (15
U.S.C.&#160; &#167;&#167;&nbsp;77aaa-77bbbb) (the &#147;TIA&#148;),
as in effect on the date of the Indenture.&#160;
Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, the Notes are subject
to all such terms, and Holders of Notes are referred to the Indenture and the
TIA for a statement of them.&#160; The Notes
are senior subordinated unsecured obligations of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160; <u>Optional Redemption</u>.&#160; (a) The Euro Notes will be redeemable, at
the- Company&#146;s option, in whole at any time or in part from time to time, on
and after January&nbsp;1, 2010, upon not less than 30 nor more than 60 days&#146;
notice, at the following redemption prices (expressed as percentages of the
principal amount thereof) if redeemed during the twelve-month period commencing
on January&nbsp;1 of the year set forth below, plus, in each case, accrued and
unpaid interest thereon, if any, to the date of redemption:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align="center">
